data.text:
Poppy Montgomery is an American actress who played the recurring role of Samantha Spade in 160 episodes of the CBS mystery television series. Without leaving a trace. She started her career in the 90s and has built an impressive filmography over the years. His works include commercially successful productions like NYPD Blue, Murder in the Hamptons which is also known as Million Dollar Murder and several others.

Beyond her on-screen personas, Poppy has a personality and life story that hasn’t been scripted and acted out. Find out here about the actress’ background, acting, husband and children, including how much money Poppy Montgomery has racked up over the years as an on-screen diva.

Poppy Montgomery Bio, Age

Poppy petal emma elizabeth deveraux donaghue whoWe just know Poppy Montgomery was born on June 15, 1972 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. Her parents are Nicola (née Montgomery), a business and market executive and dad – Phil Donaghue, a restaurant owner. Poppy has four siblings, four sisters who are named after flowers: Lily Belle Donahue, Rosie Thorn Donahue, Daisy Yellow Donahue and Marigold Sun Donahue, and one brother named Jethro Tull Donahue, after rock band star – Jethro tull.

Growing up, Poppy Montgomery hated school and went out of her way to pack when she was enrolled in a new school. This saw her briefly attend a total of 6 private schools from which she was expelled until she dropped out altogether at the age of 15. This is not to say that the girl was wasting her young life, no, she had so much energy and passion for the game that the classical schools she was enrolled in and expelled from did not offer what she had need to express themselves.

Following her latest expulsion and subsequent decision not to return to school, Poppy embarks on a trip to the island of Bali; in the province of Indonesia, with her then boyfriend. Three years later, she decides to leave for the United States and arrives in Florida where she hopes to meet an exchange student with whom she became friends while trying out schools. Over time, Poppy Montgomery realized that the hope of seeing her supposed friend was a wild goose chase. After being raised by the only person she probably knew in the United States but who was still determined to make the most of her arrival in the land of opportunity, she moved to Los Angeles to pursue a career in theater and music. rest, as they say, that’s the story.

After arriving in Los Angeles, the future screen star found refuge with two of her brother’s friends and simultaneously fervently sent portraits to Bob McGowan, who was previously manager of Julia Roberts. Over time Bob signed Poppy Montgomery and she was featured in some TV roles around this time, one of which was NYPD Blue (1996) as Allison in the episode “Burnin Love”. The actress starred in a few works before her big break in the CBS miniseries Blond (2001) where she portrayed the character of Marilyn Monroe. Sans Trace, one of his most successful works then passed from 2002 to 2009, Poppy performed alongside Anthony LaPaglia, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Enrique Murciano, Roselyn Sánchez and Eric Close.Raising Waylon (2004), Between (2005), True Blue (2010), Unforgettable (2011-2016), A Substitute Nightmare (2017) and a few others.

Net value

There is no doubt that Poppy Montgomery’s career has been successful. Occasionally, she has featured in many commercially successful works and it is obviously unclear how high her career will skyrocket. Despite all she’s done, the Without a Trace star has a net worth of around $8 million and a salary of over $85,000 per movie episode. With more works to come, provided they are successful, the actress should see her salary and even her net worth increase.

Family – husband, children

The Austrian actress isn’t one with a long list of men she’s dated or even married. From what we know, she only had two relationships, the first ending in a breakup and the second growing stronger than ever.

Poppy Montgomery was married to Adam Kaufman whom she first met in 2015 while working on the film. In between, the two still worked on L ying to be perfect in 2010 but earlier in 2007, Poppy got pregnant for Adam. In December of the same year, she gave birth to their son Jackson Phillip. Almost four years later, the American American magazine – Life & Style, on October 10, 2011, revealed that the two men were no longer together.

Before the end of 2011, Poppy found love with Shawn Sanford, who works as the director of lifestyle marketing at Microsoft. The duo had previously met in Puerto Rico before they began their relationship. In April 2013, the actress had their first child named Violet Grace (daughter). After Violet, Gus Monroe (son) came in November 2014. Although it is not publicly known when they got married, Poppy Montgomery revealed that she married Shawn Sanford on Chinese New Year’s Day at Disneyland in the presence of their children.

Body measurements

Poppy Montgomery aside from having a pretty face also has an amazing body to go with it. She is 1.63m tall and 5ft 4in tall and weighs 62kg which is equivalent to 137lbs. The Australian-born American actress has a prominent bust that measures 38 inches, while her waist is 28 inches and her complementary hips are 37 inches.
